news.title: Anthropic Waters Down Core AI Safety Rules
news.description: Anthropic has tossed out one of the firmest safety vows in the AI business. The San Francisco startup, founded by former OpenAI staffers who warned about runaway AI, has scrapped its Responsible Scaling Policy, which required it to pause training more powerfu…

news.title: Stocks Climb as Traders Look to Nvidia for AI News: Markets Wrap
news.description: Wall Street traders bracing for Nvidia Corp.’s results drove stocks higher, hoping for evidence that the outlook for artificial intelligence remains intact. Bitcoin topped $69,000. A rally in bonds stalled.

news.title: OpenAI asks its friends to tell their friends about Frontier
news.description:
Agent-making tool that mimics human workers is about to get its enterprise close up.
OpenAI has managed to make a name for itself with ChatGPT. But if it wants its new enterprise AI product Frontier to succeed, it's going to need help. According to an analyst…

news.title: Hacker Used Anthropic's Claude To Steal Sensitive Mexican Data
news.description: A hacker exploited Anthropic's AI chatbot to carry out a series of attacks against Mexican government agencies, resulting in the theft of a huge trove of sensitive tax and voter information, according to cybersecurity researchers. From a report: The unknown C…

news.title: Anthropic just dropped its core AI safety promise, and that should worry you
news.description: History doesn't repeat itself, but AI companies sure do.

news.title: Mixing generative AI with physics to create personal items that work in the real world
news.description: A system known as PhysiOpt complements generative AI models with physics simulations to create 3D models of personal items. Users can prompt the system using text or images, and get a blueprint that works in the real world when fabricated.

news.title: Hegseth issues an ultimatum to ‘woke AI’ Anthropic: Get with military program by Friday or lose $200 million
news.description: The Department of Defense gave the AI company a deadline of Friday to allow the Pentagon to use its AI as it sees fit or face steep penalties.

news.title: All your bots are belong to US if you don't play ball, DoD tells Anthropic
news.description:
AI firm drops key safety pledge as Pentagon dispute drags on

news.title: Big Tech companies to meet Trump at White House to sign pledge on data center power costs
news.description: The companies attending the March 4 meeting include Amazon, Google, Meta, Microsoft, xAI, Oracle and OpenAI, a White House official confirmed.

news.title: Deutsche Bank makes the case for why Anthropic won't kill software stocks
news.description: Anthropic has become a boogeyman on Wall Street, with Claude's capabilities slamming various stock sectors. Deutsche says software will survive.

news.title: The Pentagon Is Pushing Anthropic to Make the Most Evil A.I. Possible. Will It?
news.description: The company behind Claude once promised to build safe and ethical tech. Pete Hegseth is putting that promise to the test.

news.title: The Samsung Galaxy S26 Has 3 New AI Tricks That Could Make Gemini Useful
news.description: Google has new AI features for the Galaxy S26, including a new Gemini tool that lets the AI book rides and order food for you while you do something else.

news.title: Gemini Starts Ordering Your Groceries and Booking Rideshares
news.description: For AI to truly be useful to the masses, it’s going to have to be more than a research assistant or code builder or basic task completer. It’s going to have to perform difficult tasks for you that would typically require multiple steps from you or through mul…

news.title: Pentagon to Anthropic: If You Won't Let Us Use Your AI for Mass Surveillance or Autonomous Weapons, Expect Punishment
news.description: The Pentagon wants Anthropic to remove limits on AI use for autonomous weapons and mass surveillance, raising civil liberties concerns.

news.title: Android Update Puts Gemini AI In the Driver's Seat for Ride-Hail, Food Orders
news.description:

news.title: Anthropic says U.S. military can use its AI systems for missile defense
news.description: Defense chief Pete Hegseth has threatened to force the company to lift guardrails against greater military use of AI.

news.title: Gemini is getting its first agentic capabilities
news.description: Google's Gemini AI is getting one step closer to being more like an actual assistant. Starting with some Pixel 10 phones and the Samsung Galaxy S26 series, Gemini will be able to hail an Uber or put together a DoorDash order on its own. It's called task autom…

clusters.title: Impact of Drop in Safety Pledge

clusters.title: Policy and Industry Concerns

stocks.ai_explanation: NVIDIA Corporation is a leading manufacturer of graphics processing units (GPUs), primarily used in computer systems for rendering graphical user interfaces and other visual effects. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.

Microsoft Corporation is a multinational technology corporation headquartered in Redmond, Washington, United States. It is best known for producing Windows operating systems and Office productivity suite. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.

Google LLC is an American multinational technology conglomerate headquartered in Mountain View, California, United States. It is best known for providing online search engine services, web-based email services, cloud computing services, mobile ad networks, and Android operating system. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.

Amazon.com, Inc., commonly referred to as Amazon, is an American multinational e-commerce corporation headquartered in Seattle, Washington, United States. It is best known for selling a wide variety of products and providing a wide range of services. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.

Meta Platforms, Inc., formerly Facebook, Inc., is an American multinational social media corporation headquartered in Menlo Park, California, United States. It is best known for creating the social networking service Facebook. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.

disclaimer: Educational use only. Not financial advice.
